mapper.insert: INSERT INTO ACCT_SEVEN_CUST_REFUND( ID, REFUND_ORDER_ID, CUST_ID, BUSINESS_TYPE, BRIEF, ORIGIN_MSG_ID, ORIGIN_MSG_TYPE, MSG_TYPE, REFUND_AMT, CURR_CODE, INST_DATE, INST_DATETIME, CREATOR )VALUES( #{id, jdbcType = VARCHAR}, #{refundOrderId,jdbcType = VARCHAR}, #{custId, jdbcType = VARCHAR}, #{businessType, jdbcType = VARCHAR}, #{brief, jdbcType = VARCHAR}, #{originMsgId, jdbcType = VARCHAR}, #{originMsgType,jdbcType = VARCHAR}, #{msgType, jdbcType = VARCHAR}, #{refundAmt, jdbcType = DECIMAL}, #{currCode, jdbcType = VARCHAR}, #{instDate, jdbcType = VARCHAR}, #{instDatetime, jdbcType = TIMESTAMP}, #{creator, jdbcType = VARCHAR} )
mapper.select: select A.ID, A.CUST_ID, A.BUSINESS_TYPE, A.BRIEF, A.ORIGIN_MSG_ID, A.ORIGIN_MSG_TYPE, A.MSG_TYPE, A.REFUND_AMT, A.CURR_CODE, A.INST_DATE, A.INST_DATETIME, (select s.user_name from sys_user s where s.user_id = A.CREATOR ) CREATOR, A.RTN_CODE, A.RTN_DATETIME, A.RTN_INFO, A.REFUND_ORDER_ID from acct_seven_cust_refund A JOIN td_refund_bill B ON B.ORDER_ID = A.REFUND_ORDER_ID WHERE B.ORDER_ID = #{orderId,jdbcType = VARCHAR}
